articles.author: Jenni Reid
articles.title: Europe stocks lower for fifth session as U.S. data weighs; Volvo Cars down 4% - CNBC
articles.description: European stock markets are suffering a fifth straight session in the red as the global outlook turns negative.
articles.content:
LONDON European stocks were lower Friday, heading toward a fifth straight loss this week.
The pan-European Stoxx 600 index was down 0.09% at 1:45 p.m., pulling back some earlier losses.
After closi… [+1988 chars]

articles.author: Pierre Celerier
articles.title: Spacecraft flies closer to Mercury than planned after thruster glitch - Phys.org
articles.description: A spacecraft carrying European and Japanese probes passed closer to Mercury than originally planned overnight after thruster problems delayed the mission to study the little-known, sun-scorched planet.
articles.content: A spacecraft carrying European and Japanese probes passed closer to Mercury than originally planned overnight after thruster problems delayed the mission to study the little-known, sun-scorched plane… [+3906 chars]

articles.title: Sentinel-2C joins the Copernicus family in orbit - European Space Agency
articles.description: The third Copernicus Sentinel-2 satellite launched today aboard the final Vega rocket from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana. Sentinel-2C will continue providing high-resolution data that is essential to Copernicus – Europe’s world leading Earth observation…
